snippet: Laszlo Csatary, now 98, is accused of helping to send nearly 12,000 Hungarian Jews to Nazi death camps.
abstract: Prosecutor in Budapest files war crimes charges against Laszlo Csatary, 98-year-old Hungarian man accused of beating Jewish men, women and children under his supervision and helping to send almost 12,000 Hungarian Jews to Nazi death camps during World War II.
lead_paragraph: Laszlo Csatary, now 98, is accused of helping to send nearly 12,000 Hungarian Jews to Nazi death camps.

headline.main: Hungarian Charged With War Crimes for Actions in World War II
headline.print_headline:
Hungary: 98-Year-Old Is Charged
With Nazi-Era War Crimes

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
